plot: Two conmen competing for the hand of a heiress get drawn into love - and into trying to save her from an evil criminal.
title: Andaz Apna Apna
plot_es: Two conmen competing for the hand of a heiress get drawn into love - and into trying to save her from an evil criminal.
plot_en: Two conmen competing for the hand of a heiress get drawn into love - and into trying to save her from an evil criminal.
